definition: to move (i.e. relocate oneself)/to move (sth relatively heavy or bulky)/to shift/to copy indiscriminately

sentences.english: The wooden churches were transported here and reconstructed.
sentences.chinese: 这座木构教堂是被搬运到这儿并重建的。

sentences.english: Could you tell me more about what you need us to do?
sentences.chinese: 我们是专业的搬运公司而且我们有特殊的保护措施。

sentences.english: The porter， however， could not understand me.
sentences.chinese: 然而搬运工却不明白我的话。

sentences.english: Yes. Just tell the redcap you want a taxi.
sentences.chinese: 是的，只要告诉搬运工你要叫辆出租车。

sentences.english: Additional expenses come when enlisting the help of porters and guides.
sentences.chinese: 如果你雇佣搬运工和向导的话，还回增加额外的开支。

sentences.english: Part Two591. The packing must be able to withstand rough handling.
sentences.chinese: 包装必须经得伏蛮横搬运。

sentences.english: That was transported by and dropped from an iceberg.
sentences.chinese: 系由冰山搬运而来并从中坠下的。

sentences.english: But the plan means forgoing storage revenue and standard handling fees.
sentences.chinese: 但此计划意味着放弃仓储的收入和标准搬运费。

sentences.english: We are professional movers and we have adopted special protective measures.
sentences.chinese: 我们是专业的搬运公司而且我们有特殊的保护措施。

sentences.english: The damage was caused by rough handling when the goods were loaded on board ship at the dock.
sentences.chinese: 货物损坏是在码头搬运装船时因野蛮装卸所造成的。

sentences.english: The porters may be identified by their red caps.
sentences.chinese: 从他们戴的红帽子就可以辨认出他们是行李搬运工。

sentences.english: Holy-Flag will be customized for the entire handling process.
sentences.chinese: 圣旗将为企业定制整个搬运过程。

sentences.english: They banked out the coal in default of means for removing it.
sentences.chinese: 他们因缺少搬运工具而把开出的煤堆起来。

sentences.english: A porter from the Galaxy Hotel is welcoming Mr.
sentences.chinese: 一位银河宾馆的行李搬运工在大厅里接待布朗先生。

sentences.english: Suppose I wanted to hire a Mini van — how much would it cost?
sentences.chinese: 一假如我要租一辆小型搬运车，要花多少钱？

definition: to load or unload/to transfer/to assemble and disassemble
to move (i.e. relocate oneself)/to move (sth relatively heavy or bulky)/to shift/to copy indiscriminately
